reviews.text: Will never have a problem with parking here. Too many spaces for the amount of cars that use them! Station is not staffed, but is clean, tidy, and easy to access. Announcements are a tad quiet, as they are at all Scotrail stations to be honest. There is a small shelter from the rain, can be a bit congested sometimes if there are more than 4 or 5 people inside! Tickets can be bought on the platform via the automated ticket machine, or onboard any train service that stops here.
